link_desc:
This role will install Zabbix Server by making use of Ansible

The role is rewritten and is using regexp instead of templates

This way we can still use the same role even when Zabbix upgrades or modifies the Zabbix Server configuration file. Without having to add a new template for it in the role.

New parameters not added in the playbook will be ignored and left untouched
tags: ansible, zabbix, server, deployment, configuration management
author: Patrik Uytterhoeven
